tool_description: Use this API to pull relevant automobile data such as the car make, model, type, and year.
name: Car Data
title: Car Data

api_list.name: Cars
api_list.description: Retrieve and filter lists of cars

api_list.name: Types
api_list.description: get a list of supported types
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-data.p.rapidapi.com/cars/types"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
